channel.title: News on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in News on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: Easter Candy
item.description: Easter is right around the corner, and we are in need of candy donations for our annual children’s Easter Egg Hunt!

item.title: Easter Lilies
item.description: First Baptist Church family and friends, if you would like to order Easter lilies in honor or in memory of a loved one, please include the following information along with a $10 check: number of lilies ordered, your name, the name of the person honored or memorialized, and whether the order is in honor or in memory.

item.title: Visitor or Bulletin Information
item.description: If you would like an announcement in the April Visitor, please email it to Wade by Sunday, March 15.
